document_data.name: Imaskarran Tome of Fire
document_data.mainbody:
The '''''Imaskarran Tome of Fire''''' was a heavy and tattered tome with a single rune on the cover, translating simply to "Fire". The ''Imaskarran Tome of Fire'' detailed the process of creating a ''[[wand of fireballs]]'' from a [[quartz]] crystal and the belly of a [[fire beetle]], through a spell of ''[[fireball]]''.{{cite game/Neverwinter Nights}}

[[Eltoora Sarptyl]] sought, maybe with the help of the [[Hero of Neverwinter]], this tome around [[Port Llast]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}. Though allegedly of [[Imaskar|Imaskarran]] origin, they were readable to the [[Hero of Neverwinter]]. It was in the possession of the [[undead]] [[Kharlat Jhareg]] of the [[Charwood]].
